dmca.title: Re: Stolen Content
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern: Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA"). Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim. Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/about_us/legal_docs/ThePlanet%20Copyright%20Infringeme nt%2001%2015%2007%20FINAL.pdf Legal Response Team THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC. -----Original Message----- From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] Sent: Monday, June 04, 2007 5:43 AM To: Copyright Subject: [ThePlanetAbuse-C4396208F] Re: Stolen Content ==== Forwarded Ticket ==== 1. Re: Stolen Content Added by system at Monday, Jun 4 2007 10:41 am X-MailFrom: ryanarrowsmith@gmail.com X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net Received: from [216.12.192.67] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for ; Mon Jun 4 10:41:13 2007 Received: (qmail 27064 invoked by alias); 4 Jun 2007 15:41:12 -0000 Delivered-To: abuse@inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net Received: (qmail 27061 invoked from network); 4 Jun 2007 15:41:12 -0000 Received: from spooling.theplanet.com (69.56.141.4) by inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net with SMTP; 4 Jun 2007 15:41:12 -0000 Return-path: Delivery-date: Mon, 04 Jun 2007 10:41:13 -0500 Received: from [172.16.220.10] (helo=DALD2EXCH01.PLANET.LOCAL) by spooling.theplanet.com (envelope-from ryanarrowsmith@gmail.com) with esmtp (Exim) id 1HvEgD-0005pF-7q for abuse@inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net; Mon, 04 Jun 2007 10:41:13 -0500 Received: from smtp02.theplanet.com ([70.87.6.111]) by DALD2EXCH01.PLANET.LOCAL with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); Mon, 4 Jun 2007 10:40:56 -0500 Received: from mail.theplanet.com ([216.185.111.52]) by smtp02.theplanet.com with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); Mon, 4 Jun 2007 10:40:56 -0500 Received: from mx02.inside.filter.theplanet.com ([172.16.214.181] helo=mx02.filter.theplanet.com) by mail.theplanet.com (envelope-from ryanarrowsmith@gmail.com) with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) (Exim) id 1HvEfw-0003Lj-LZ for abuse@theplanet.com; Mon, 04 Jun 2007 10:40:56 -0500 Received: from wa-out-1112.google.com ([209.85.146.176]) by mx02.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from ryanarrowsmith@gmail.com) with esmtp (Exim) id 1HvEfk-000296-6j for abuse@theplanet.com; Mon, 04 Jun 2007 10:40:44 -0500 Received: by wa-out-1112.google.com with SMTP id m38so1829828waf for ; Mon, 04 Jun 2007 08:40:41 -0700 (PDT) DKIM-Signature: a=rsa-sha1; c=relaxed/relaxed; d=gmail.com; s=beta; h=domainkey-signature:received:received:message-id:date:from:to:subject: cc:in-reply-to:mime-version:content-type:references; b=AbgEmo1EhmZiKl3REOuBm31VVgURwHXLWBsmUR8NZvin3D561VlUUm0I95YJ3emkMQaOUC p5T8RnQ4ibbf8Y2MuNXA+vulVXoA4LRZcMMdclkE8bxqY3WYE4KxMLyLI+JlZsbQ9L1hPrsz zWMZXD3GdmJMiJj9kzQVdJ0P1STN0= DomainKey-Signature: a=rsa-sha1; c=nofws; d=gmail.com; s=beta; h=received:message-id:date:from:to:subject:cc:in-reply-to:mime-version:c ontent-type:references; b=T2CiO72j0QgRptajqrbTOe5cd1qARcEQ2EWyLyTnXanhcJKHJiaWyiKM/W0knh7PvI16sk vAP0Z4BBHMAUmXiYz92hhjE3J/S5Py+ejPp9wdeGlZb5YMvWYVyzsM5b9j7ZxH2J7PesYRb7 N7uqZDgORa4SNUmiJ/li2+NLtaWoI= Received: by 10.114.201.1 with SMTP id y1mr4920234waf.1180971641281; Mon, 04 Jun 2007 08:40:41 -0700 (PDT) Received: by 10.141.201.9 with HTTP; Mon, 4 Jun 2007 08:40:41 -0700 (PDT) Message-ID: <738195bf0706040840i2f57ffb8r3b8b1de5688b2f91@mail.gmail.com> Date: Mon, 4 Jun 2007 10:40:41 -0500 From: "Ryan Arrowsmith" To: Copyright Subject: Re: Stolen Content Cc: Abuse , Legal , "Cerberus Helpdesk" , "Technical Support" In-Reply-To: MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: multipart/alternative; boundary="----=_Part_877_8739411.1180971641254" References: <738195bf0705291104p491a1924v9ab5100ca295d9e8@mail.gmail.com> <738195bf0706030629i465e42ecxcbb103eb05667c13@mail.gmail.com> Received-SPF: pass (mx02.filter.theplanet.com: domain of gmail.com designates 209.85.146.176 as permitted sender) client-ip=209.85.146.176; envelope-from=ryanarrowsmith@gmail.com; helo=wa-out-1112.google.com; X-OriginalArrivalTime: 04 Jun 2007 15:40:56.0923 (UTC) FILETIME=[BE404AB0:01C7A6BE] (multipart/alternative) MIME element (text/plain) Have the content removed. I am the copyright holder, the site I've not e-mailed you about is blatantly stealing content from other users (not just me) so you need to decide what kind of company you are and how you're going to react. I'm not going to spend all day filling this out the way you'd like me to. One of your users has stolen my content, which is clearly copyrighted, and you're allowing it to be reprinted. I am not a ThePlanet.com user, I'm not bound by your terms and conditions. Either remove it today or don't; I'll make my decision how to proceed from there. I'd like a confirmation e-mail when the content had been removed. On 6/4/07, Copyright wrote: > > To Whom It May Concern: > > > > Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not > substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital > Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA"). > > > > Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your > claim. > > > > Please visit our web site at > www.theplanet.com/about_us/legal_docs/ThePlanet%20Copyright%20Infringeme nt%2001%2015%2007%20FINAL.pdf > > > > Legal Response Team > > THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC. > > > > > ------------------------------ > > *From:* Ryan Arrowsmith [mailto:ryanarrowsmith@gmail.com] > *Sent:* Sunday, June 03, 2007 8:29 AM > *To:* Abuse; Legal; Cerberus Helpdesk; Cerberus Helpdesk; Technical > Support > *Subject:* Re: Stolen Content > > > > This is the second time I am requesting that you remove my stolen content > from this website. *Please remove it immediately.* > > On 5/29/07, *Ryan Arrowsmith* wrote: > > The website videoto.net is reprinting an article of mine without > permission, and don't have information listed on contacting them. I'd like > the content removed immediately. Please respond asap. Thanks. > > My article: http://ryanarrowsmith.com/2007/04/18/an-open-letter-to-hollywood/ > > Their post: http://videoto.net/id/2180/ > > Ryan Arrowsmith > http://ryanarrowsmith.com > > > MIME element (text/html) Have the content removed. 

I am the copyright holder, the site I've not e-mailed you about is blatantly stealing content from other users (not just me) so you need to decide what kind of company you are and how you're going to react.

I'm not going to spend all day filling this out the way you'd like me to.  One of your users has stolen my content, which is clearly copyrighted, and you're allowing it to be reprinted.  I am not a ThePlanet.com user, I'm not bound by your terms and conditions.  Either remove it today or don't; I'll make my decision how to proceed from there.

I'd like a confirmation e-mail when the content had been removed.

On 6/4/07, Copyright < Copyrightold@theplanet.com> wrote:

To Whom It May Concern:

 

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

 

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim.

 

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/about_us/legal_docs/ThePlanet%20Copyright%20Infringeme nt%2001%2015%2007%20FINAL.pdf

 

Legal Response Team

THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

 

 

From: Ryan Arrowsmith [mailto:ryanarrowsmith@gmail.com]
Sent: Sunday, June 03, 2007 8:29 AM
To: Abuse; Legal; Cerberus Helpdesk; Cerberus Helpdesk; Technical Support
Subject: Re: Stolen Content

 

This is the second time I am requesting that you remove my stolen content from this website.  Please remove it immediately.

On 5/29/07, Ryan Arrowsmith <ryanarrowsmith@gmail.com> wrote:

The website videoto.net is reprinting an article of mine without permission, and don't have information listed on contacting them.  I'd like the content removed immediately.  Please respond asap.  Thanks.

My article: http://ryanarrowsmith.com/2007/04 /18/an-open-letter-to-hollywood/
Their post: http://videoto.net/id/2180/

Ryan Arrowsmith
http://ryanarrowsmith.com

 


MIME element (text/plain)
